name: max
description: Програма повинна знайти найбільший елемент массиву b.
simplifyPrefix: (DEFPRED (EX a b m Arr)) (BG_PUSH (FORALL (a b m Arr) (PATS (EX a b m Arr)) (AND (IMPLIES (> a b) (IFF (EX a b m Arr) FALSE)) (IMPLIES (<= a b) (IFF (EX a b m Arr) (OR (EX a (- b 1) m Arr) (EQ (select Arr b) m)))))))
